info.name: Tumblr's Timeline Dark
info.description: A darker CSS for your Tumblr's CSS. It has portrait and landscape mode each one having little tweaks for each mode. You can change the wallpapers easily. You must have some kind of adblocker or you will have the CSS weird in the top section.
info.additionalInfo: Screens are a big summary, but everything (I think) I could think is modified. Remember to check the blogname option.

settings.label: Type here your blogname (the part before .tumblr.com) if you want messages to have custom format
